name: FIMFiction Less Fancy
description:
This style drastically changes the appearance of FIMFiction and makes some features inaccessible! Also, I have only tested this as an anonymous reader (no user account). FIMFiction has a creeping featurism that distracts me from reading and finding stories.

Here is a summary of what it does:

  • Hides front page popular stories.
  • Hides all background images.
  • Hides most story statistics (like the views and comments counters).
  • Hides avatars.
  • Removes text shadows.
  • Expands hidden chapters.
  • Hides chapter release dates and word counters.
  • Hides the sidebar on chapter list pages.
  • Removes the gaudy hover animation on list items.
  • Hides Facebook Like links.
  • Hides advertisements.
  • Tweaks the story summary box.
  • Hides comment thumbs-up, thumps-down, and permalink buttons.
  • Hides the footer.
